content: The test will start with three easy example questions which will not be marked or timed.
Grace thought of a number, added 7, multiplied by 3, took away 5 and divided by 4 to give an answer of 7.
In these questions, the coordinates (e.g. A1) of a square refer to the number in the square, e.g. A1 = 9, What is B1 + C2?
In these questions, the coordinates (e.g. A1) of a square refer to the number in the square. Multiply A1 by B2. Put the result in E1. Now divide E1 by D4.
The test has 26 questions and you will have 25 minutes to do them. At the end of the test (when 25 minutes have elapsed), Please note that this is quite a demanding test.
